ABOUT ME

Hi! I'm Isabella, a web designer based in Milan.

I concluded my studies in Communication, Innovation and Multimedia at the University of Pavia, thanks to which I approached the web design world. My thesis work on Internet of Things and Smart Cities allowed me to study and understand the potential of new technologies and new media. I decided to continue my studies in this area, at the Mohole school in Milan, where I am currently enrolled in the Web & Digital Media course. The realization of several websites for didactic purposes allowed me to discover the passion for the development of Wordpress themes and the proneness for Front-end side development.
